metadata.title: Convert JPG to WebP - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert JPG images to WebP format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. Reduce file size by up to 30% while maintaining quality. 100% free.

hero.desc: Convert JPG to WebP online for free. Simply drop your JPG images below to convert them to WebP in seconds.

intro.title: Better Compression
intro.content: WebP format provides 25-30% better compression than JPG while maintaining similar visual quality. Perfect for modern web applications and mobile apps.

scenes.title: Website Optimization
scenes.desc: Convert JPG to WebP for faster page loads.

scenes.title: Mobile Optimization
scenes.desc: Reduce data usage with smaller WebP files.

faq.a: WebP offers 25-30% better compression than JPG with similar quality.
All modern browsers support WebP. Older browsers may need fallbacks.
